snippet.title: Ravenswatch | Launch Animated Trailer
snippet.description:
Ravenswatch is available on Steam now: http://nacon.me/Ravenswatch 

Ravenswatch is a top-down roguelike action game that combines intense real-time combat with deep gameplay and high replay value. After the success of Curse of the Dead Gods©, Passtech returns with a new formula and game experience that can be played solo or with up to four players in co-op.

After a year and a half of Early Acces, where tales intertwine with darkness, Ravenswatch has awakened in its full, fearsome glory with the release of version 1.0.

Ravenswatch is no ordinary tale. It is a descent into a world where the stories of old are twisted, corrupted by evil forces. You have survived the trials of our Early Access, but now a more sinister challenge awaits: the 1.0 release, filled with nightmares, sharpened blades, and an unforgiving darkness.

Now's the time to call your friends and dive into the tale of your ultimate challenge!

Ravenswatch is out on Steam and will be available on November 28th on PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5, Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S and later on Nintendo Switch.

Animation by  @Bobbypills 

Follow Ravenswatch on X (Twitter) ► https://twitter.com/PlayRavenswatch
Follow Passtech Games on X (Twitter) ►  https://twitter.com/PasstechGames
-------------------------------
